text: Robert Matthew Van Winkle (born October 31, 1967 in Dallas, Texas), best known as Vanilla Ice, is an American rapper, actor, and singer. He had songs under SBK Records. His most notable song is "Ice Ice Baby". The song was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1991. He has had other songs released over the years. Comedian Jim Carrey did a spoof on the song, called "White White Baby". Vanilla Ice was a contestant in the second season of The Surreal Life in 2004 and in the sixth series of Dancing on Ice in 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0406678/bio Category:Actors from Dallas Category:American movie actors Category:Rappers from Texas Category:American songwriters Category:Dancing on Ice participants Category:Singers from Dallas Category:The Surreal Life participants Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century American musicians Category:20th-century American rappers Category:21st-century American musicians Category:American bass guitarists Category:American record producers Category:American keyboardists Category:American drummers Category:American rock singers Category:American pop rappers
title: Vanilla Ice
